name: Robbing the Princess
description:
In Robbing the Princess you have to help Alec and Suzy break into a ship to steal some of its cargo.

This is the first adventure game I have made in which you can control more than one character, and the second with an unlockable director's commentary.

Robbing the Princess is my forth completed point and click adventure game and, like the previous three, was created in less than a month for a Monthly Adventure Game Studio (MAGS) competition on the Adventure Game Studio forums. This time the theme was "Breaking in".

Controls:
Press F1 during play for a summary of the controls.
Press Escape for the main menu.

Robbing the  Princess was built for Windows but also works in ScummVM versions 2.5+ so you should be able to use that to play on Mac, Linux etc.
